original_text: When you make a loan of any kind to your neighbor, do not go into their house to get what is offered to you as a pledge.
korean_text: 네 이웃에게 무엇을 꾸어줄 때에 너는 그의 집에 들어가서 전당물을 취하지 말고

sentences.original_text: When you make a loan of any kind
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 어떤 종류의 대출을 할 때에

to get what is offered to you as a pledge
